org.mini2Dx.ui.element

Interface Navigatable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsoluteModal, AlignedModal, Modal, Tab, TabView

    public interface Navigatable
    Common interface for UiElements that can be navigated by keyboard or controller

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getId()
      Returns the unique id of the Navigatable
      UiNavigation getNavigation()
      Returns the UiNavigation currently being navigated
      ActionableRenderNode hotkey(ControllerButton button)
      Returns the corresponding ActionableRenderNode mapped to a ControllerButton hotkey
      ActionableRenderNode hotkey(int keycode)
      Returns the corresponding ActionableRenderNode mapped to a keyboard hotkey
      ActionableRenderNode navigate(int keycode)
      Triggers a navigation and returns the newly highlighted ActionableRenderNode
      void setHotkey(ControllerButton button, Actionable actionable)
      Maps a ControllerButton to a Actionable
      void setHotkey(int keycode, Actionable actionable)
      Maps a keyboard button to a Actionable
      void unsetHotkey(ControllerButton button)
      Unmaps a ControllerButton hotkey
      void unsetHotkey(int keycode)
      Unmaps a keyboard hotkey

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Returns the unique id of the Navigatable
        Returns:
        A non-null String that is the id

      • navigate

        ActionableRenderNode navigate(int keycode)
        Triggers a navigation and returns the newly highlighted ActionableRenderNode
        Parameters:
        keycode - The navigation Input.Keys value
        Returns:
        Null if no UiNavigation is available

      • hotkey

        ActionableRenderNode hotkey(int keycode)
        Returns the corresponding ActionableRenderNode mapped to a keyboard hotkey
        Parameters:
        keycode - The Input.Keys keycode that is the hotkey
        Returns:
        Null if there is no mapping

      • hotkey

        ActionableRenderNode hotkey(ControllerButton button)
        Returns the corresponding ActionableRenderNode mapped to a ControllerButton hotkey
        Parameters:
        button - The ControllerButton that is the hotkey
        Returns:
        Null if there is no mapping

      • setHotkey

        void setHotkey(ControllerButton button,
               Actionable actionable)
        Maps a ControllerButton to a Actionable
        Parameters:
        button - The ControllerButton that is the hotkey
        actionable - The Actionable to trigger when the hotkey is pressed

      • setHotkey

        void setHotkey(int keycode,
               Actionable actionable)
        Maps a keyboard button to a Actionable
        Parameters:
        keycode - The Input.Keys keycode that is the hotkey
        actionable - The Actionable to trigger when the key is pressed

      • unsetHotkey

        void unsetHotkey(ControllerButton button)
        Unmaps a ControllerButton hotkey
        Parameters:
        button - The ControllerButton that is the hotkey

      • unsetHotkey

        void unsetHotkey(int keycode)
        Unmaps a keyboard hotkey
        Parameters:
        keycode - The Input.Keys keycode that is the hotkey

      • getNavigation

        UiNavigation getNavigation()
        Returns the UiNavigation currently being navigated
        Returns:
        Null if no navigation is occurring
